story_24_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Our match will be starting soon!
Ah, how it gets the heart beating, non?
story_24_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I wasn’t able to see the outcome of this battle,
but I’ve got a feeling it’s going to be very intense.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I’m certain that feeling is correct...
I’m looking forward to a great battle with you
and your team, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_24_02000/2401_1001_0400_10: Yeah! We’ll have the hottest battle ever!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
By the way, where’s Elesa?
Is she still getting ready?
story_24_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Oui. Préparation has taken a bit longer than we
would have liked, but she should be done soon...
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Oh goodness, Elesa. What lovely and elegant
clothes you’re wearing!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1100_10: Wow, Elesa! Amazing! Too amazing even!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
This is my sygna suit. I wanted to face you in
battle wearing this special outfit.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Teaming up with Sabrina and Fantina has really
helped me polish my skills. I’m as versatile in
battle as a Rotom now.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
In this place, at this battle... I will be the focus of
everyone’s attention!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Wow, you’re dazzling, Elesa. I feel like my head
is spinning.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Keep it together, Rosa! Your eyes are turning
into stars!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Hee hee. If you’re so captivated with only this
glimpse, you’re in trouble. I’m only going to shine
brighter from here on out.
story_24_02000/2401_0401_2100_10:
I thought so. I’m really looking forward to
battling you.
story_24_02000/2401_0402_2300_10:
Hee hee. I’m flattered, but you should get ready!
I’m really looking forward to battling you.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_2400_10: Looks like it’s about time to shine.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
The curtain is rising! Two bright stars
will clash! This will be the greatest—
story_24_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
That’s right! It’s time for the curtain to rise,
but it’s going to be our performance that
everyone remembers!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_2700_10: Team Break?! What are they doing here?
story_24_02000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Look how many there are! Where did they all
come from?
story_24_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Hehehe. It seems our surprise attack was a
complete success. All thanks to that one.
story_24_02000/2401_1001_3000_10: All right, everyone! Today is our big day!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_3100_10: We’re putting a stop to the PML right here!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_3200_10: They look like they might hurt the fans!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_3500_10:
I won’t let them get away with hurting the people
who’ve come to watch our Pokémon battle!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_3600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], we’ll settle our battle
later. For now, we’ve got to work together to get
rid of these guys!
story_24_02000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Team Break, we’re going to send you packing
with a single strike!
